original: In the heart of a somber city sat a funeral home, its long corridors whispering stories of sorrow and despair. At the helm of this establishment was Mortimer Stone, a mortician with a peculiar gift. He possessed the extraordinary ability to restore not only the bodies but also the souls of the deceased, granting them a chance to live again. However, this extraordinary power came at a costly price,
